issue.title: [JS] Use flatc to generate TypeScript
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-949](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-949). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
flatbuffers recently [merged a PR](https://github.com/google/flatbuffers/pull/4232) that adds support for TypeScript. We should start using it once the capability is available in a released version.
It could also be good to try it out pre-release in case the arrow schemas reveal any bugs in the new implementation.
